p: In this study, antimicrobial activity was evaluated for different extracts of P. linearis against E. coli ATCC 8739, S. enterica ATCC 14028, B.subtilis subsp spizizeni ATCC 6633, S. aureus ATCC 6538, and C. albicans ATCC 10231. Antimicrobial activity of the extracts was compared to cefuroxime, ampicillin, and fluconazole as the standard drugs as given in Table 5 by microdilution method.
